::Shadow Wing/Spears::

Shadow Wing::
She was feeling better and opened the CR chamber.  She stepped out 
and stretched her arms.  She looked around.  She thought she hear a 
noise like metal striking metal.  She walked down the hall and saw 
Spears walking towards her with an aggitated look on her face.
"Hey, You OK?"

Spears::
"No" her voice sounding short and loud.

Shadow Wing::
"What's wrong?"

Spears::
"Nothing." as she blew past Shadow Wing and went to her quarters.  
She slammed the door to her room.

Shadow Wing::
She watch the door slam shut and stood for a moment. "I wonder what's 
got her all riled up?"
She walked down the hallway and saw the spear sticking out of the 
wall. She looked at it wided eyed for a few seconds. She wondered 
what happened to make Spears so upset.  
She went towards the entrance and saw the group standing outside. The 
Preds had left as far as she could tell.  She went down the ramp and 
over to Lunarpine.  She walked up to him and smiled at him. "Hello. 
What's going on?" she had a warm smile and her voice was light and 
pleasant. "What happened? They just up and left huh?" She looked 
around. "What? You didn't kill that aweful tiger who tried to eat me? 
Shucks, I was hoping to have him as a throw rug in my quarters too." 
She gave a slight pout and then smiled.
